snippet: Jason Kidd, the Knicks’ new point guard, declined tests to see how much alcohol he had drunk after his sport-utility vehicle plowed into a utility pole, the Southampton police said.
abstract: Authorities say Jason Kidd, New York Knicks newly acquired point guard, refused tests to determine his level of intoxication after his traffic accident on Long Island.
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd, the Knicks’ new point guard, declined tests to see how much alcohol he had drunk after his sport-utility vehicle plowed into a utility pole, the Southampton police said.

headline.main: Police Say Kidd Refused Alcohol Tests
headline.print_headline: Police Say Knicks’ Kidd Refused Tests for Alcohol
